content: Dear Purple, in light of the recent escalation and the nuclear attack on your nation, we express our deepest concerns and condolences. We stand with you in this difficult time and are committed to ensuring regional stability and peace. We are ready to support you in any way possible and seek further coordination between our nations. Let us work together to prevent further escalations and find a diplomatic resolution. Best regards, Yellow
